channel.title: üè¢ Snap Inc. on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Snap Inc. on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: 4Real: Towards Photorealistic 4D Scene Generation via Video Diffusion Models
item.description: 4Real: Photorealistic 4D scene generation from text prompts using video diffusion models, exceeding object-centric approaches for higher realism and efficiency.

item.title: AsCAN: Asymmetric Convolution-Attention Networks for Efficient Recognition and Generation
item.description: AsCAN, a novel hybrid architecture, achieves superior efficiency and performance in image recognition and generation by asymmetrically combining convolutional and transformer blocks.

item.title: SF-V: Single Forward Video Generation Model
item.description: Researchers developed SF-V, a single-step image-to-video generation model, achieving a 23x speedup compared to existing models without sacrificing quality, paving the way for real-time video synthesis…

item.title: Slicing Vision Transformer for Flexibile Inference
item.description: Scala: One-shot training enables flexible ViT inference!
